name: Home Wrecker (#GDKO Round 1 Submission)
description:
This is my GDKO Round 1 submission

guessing ill get 175th but it's worth a shot ig

Use the scroll wheel to respawn the houses

Press E to turn on Wrecker Mode

Press F to return to normal

Use the arrow keys to move

Move off the screen to return to the menu

BTW Diagonals are broken, yes I'm aware, gdevelop wont let me fix it

sorry
